name: Seeing Glass
description:
Summary

After crashing through your mirror you follow your reflection through a winding 2d maze. While hunting down your reflection you gain the ability to mirror gravity. To finally confront the culprit you must use this power to solve platforming puzzles, being the staple crate to switch and avoid the spikes.

This game was worked on as a part of the Mirror Game Jam. I'm not sure if it will still be worked on, it depends on the reception.

Controls
  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Move left, right, jump
  • Mouse Drag - Creates reverse gravity plane.
  • Esc - Pop up menu
